subject: Configure ecosystem orchestrator for 21 projects (Phase 0)
description:
Run dependency_graph.py to analyze all 21 projects. Audit tech stacks, git status, dependencies, research domains. Expand ~/.agent-core/projects.json with all 21 projects (add tech_stack, dependencies, research_domains, last_activity). Create orchestrator-config.json in each project root. Set up meta-vengine API if needed.

Success criteria:
- Dependency graph complete (valid DAG)
- All 21 projects registered with tech stacks
- Config files in all project roots
- Meta-vengine API accessible

Files to modify:
- ~/.agent-core/config.json (add ecosystem_orchestrator section with 21 projects)
- ~/.agent-core/projects.json (expand with full details)
